summary:
It's not the installer, it's only the .bsa and .esm file.
<br />
<br />Put it in the installation folder of your TESV game.
<br />(e.g. - C:\ Games\ TESV Skyrim\ Data\ ( bsa. and esm. )
descriptionHtml:
This is the Dawnguard DLC pure, plain, and simple, with no installers, and no cracks. It will work on a properly cracked Skyrim game updated to
the latest version (currently 1.9.32.0.8, aka Update 13). It will also
work with the bought version from Steam.
author: YNONN
